page.title: 16MAYFIELD HOME PARK,BAGENDON.
page.content: The Mayfield Mobile Home Park is situated on the Cheltenham road about 3.5 kms from the centre of Cirencester. The Park was established in 1938 and spreads over 22 acres altogether,today it is owned by Mr.and Mrs.Pink. There are 2 types of mobile homes, 1 is long and thin 11 metres x 4 metres. The others are short and wide 9 metres x 5 metres. The Mayfield site has many rules. All of the people must be retired or semi-retired. No children are allowed to live on the site although they are allowed to visit. Pets are not allowed. Mr. and Mrs.Pink pay the water rates and cut the lawns,the tenants pay their own electric and gas bills.
